sentences.en: Basee on the mixing-length theory of convection, macroscopical stress of the turbulence is used in hydrostatics equation of the stellar structural and evolutionary model.
sentences.cn: 以恒星结构与演化理论中常用的混合程理论为基础，将湍流作用表现出来的宏观应力引入恒星结构与演化模型中的流体静力学平衡方程。

sentences.en: Fluid Mechanics - Pascal's Principle - Hydrostatics - Atmospheric Pressure - Over Pressure in Lungs and Tires.
sentences.cn: 流体力学 - 帕斯卡原理 - 流体静力学 - 大气压强 - 肺部与轮胎过压.

sentences.en: Fluids: pressure, hydrostatics, Euler and Lagrange variables of a continuum, continuity equation, Euler equation of motion.
sentences.cn: 流体：压力，流体静力学，欧拉和一个统一体，连续性方程，欧拉运动方程拉格朗日变量。

sentences.en: This course is an introduction to principles of naval architecture, ship geometry, hydrostatics, calculation and drawing of curves of form.
sentences.cn: 本课程介绍船舶设计、船舶几何、船舶流体静力学、船体曲线计算与绘图等科目的原理。

sentences.en: Topics covered include hydrostatics, transverse stability, and incorporation of the design spiral into one's working methods.
sentences.cn: 涵盖主题包括静水力学, 横向稳定性, 以及将设计螺旋融会到个人的工作方法中.

words.tran_cn: 流体静力学的；静水力学的

trans.tran_en: the branch of science concerned with the mechanical properties and behaviour of fluids that are not in motion
